nodes.text: Arim was a male Zabrak who served as a Chief Engineer in the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY he was stationed at the Outpost Zerek on Hoth, working with Admiral Revald on retrieving the Null Cannon from the Starship Graveyard. Arim led a backup team that interrupted Republic negotiations with Sero, making him believe he was betrayed and attack. After forcing to kill him, Arim and Republic citizen contemplated on dealing with multiple copies of the Null Cannon.
